pli-tv-pvr1.2:45.3: That is, one has obtained it. This interpretation is required by the fact that it is an offense entailing relinquishment.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:116.1: For an explanation of the idea of _vikappanā_, see Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-pvr1.2:127.1: “Such things” and “that view” refer to the idea that sexual intercourse is not an obstacle to spiritual progress, see [pli-tv-bu-vb-pc68:1.49.1]().
pli-tv-pvr1.2:128.1: For the meaning of “in this way”, see [pli-tv-bu-vb-pc70:1.46.1]().
